actions.name: ActivatePipeline
actions.description: Grants permission to validate the specified pipeline and starts processing pipeline tasks. If the pipeline does not pass validation, activation fails

actions.name: AddTags
actions.description: Grants permission to add or modify tags for the specified pipeline

actions.name: CreatePipeline
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new, empty pipeline

actions.name: DeactivatePipeline
actions.description: Grants permission to Deactivate the specified running pipeline

actions.name: DeletePipeline
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a pipeline, its pipeline definition, and its run history

actions.name: DescribeObjects
actions.description: Grants permission to get the object definitions for a set of objects associated with the pipeline

actions.name: DescribePipelines
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieves metadata about one or more pipelines

actions.name: EvaluateExpression
actions.description: Grants permission to task runners to call EvaluateExpression, to evaluate a string in the context of the specified object

actions.name: GetAccountLimits
actions.description: Grants permission to call GetAccountLimits

actions.name: GetPipelineDefinition
actions.description: Grants permission to gets the definition of the specified pipeline

actions.name: ListPipelines
actions.description: Grants permission to list the pipeline identifiers for all active pipelines that you have permission to access

actions.name: PollForTask
actions.description: Grants permission to task runners to call PollForTask, to receive a task to perform from AWS Data Pipeline

actions.name: PutAccountLimits
actions.description: Grants permission to call PutAccountLimits

actions.name: PutPipelineDefinition
actions.description: Grants permission to add tasks, schedules, and preconditions to the specified pipeline

actions.name: QueryObjects
actions.description: Grants permission to query the specified pipeline for the names of objects that match the specified set of conditions

actions.name: RemoveTags
actions.description: Grants permission to remove existing tags from the specified pipeline

actions.name: ReportTaskProgress
actions.description: Grants permission to task runners to call ReportTaskProgress, when they are assigned a task to acknowledge that it has the task

actions.name: ReportTaskRunnerHeartbeat
actions.description: Grants permission to task runners to call ReportTaskRunnerHeartbeat every 15 minutes to indicate that they are operational

actions.name: SetStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to requests that the status of the specified physical or logical pipeline objects be updated in the specified pipeline

actions.name: SetTaskStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to task runners to call SetTaskStatus to notify AWS Data Pipeline that a task is completed and provide information about the final status

actions.name: ValidatePipelineDefinition
actions.description: Grants permission to validate the specified pipeline definition to ensure that it is well formed and can be run without error
